main event: A civilian in Dalton, Georgia reported seeing an aircraft flying very low over his driveway with no sound, visible for only 1 second.
interesting points: The aircraft was described as moving so fast that it was barely visible, with no obstruction in its flight path.
The witness's two children, aged 14 and 16, also saw the object.
The witness, a car salesman, reported the incident and the initials XX were involved in the investigation.
The report was certified by Major Don A. Reardon, Jr., Chief of Flight Operations Section, USAF.
The report is part of Operation Grudge and is addressed to the Commanding General at Wright-Patterson AFB.
